instructions: Open the iTunes Store , tap More, then tap Purchased. Choose a family member. Tap a category (for example, Music), tap a purchased item, then tap the Redownload button to download it.
Open the App Store . Tap the My Account button or your profile picture at the top right. Tap Purchased, choose a family member, then tap the Redownload button next to a purchased item to download it.

Open the Books app . Tap the Account button , or your profile picture, at the top right. Choose a family member, then tap a category (for example, Books or Audiobooks). Tap All Books, Recent Purchases, or a genre, then tap the Redownload button next to a purchased item to download it.

Open the Apple TV app . Tap Library, tap Family Sharing, then choose a family member. Tap a category (for example, TV Shows or Movies) or a genre, tap a purchased item, then tap the Download button to download it.
Go to Settings > [ your name ] > Family Sharing. Tap iCloud Storage, then follow the onscreen instructions.
